{{Marvel Database:Team Template | Image = | Name = [[Gods of Egypt]] | EditorialNames = | Aliases = | Status = Active | Identity = | Reality = Earth-616 | BaseOfOperations = [[Celestial Heliopolis]]; formerly [[Heliopolis (Egypt)|Heliopolis]] (near modern-day [[Ain Shams]], [[Egypt]]), [[Hermopolis]] (near modern-day [[el-Ashmunein]], Egypt) | Leaders = [[Osiris (Earth-616)|Osiris]];
possibly [[Horus (Deity) (Earth-616)|Horus]]{{r|Heroic Age: Prince of Power #2}} (formerly as proxy for Osiris);
formerly [[Seth (Earth-616)|Seth]] (usurper), [[Thoth (Earth-616)|Thoth]] (arbitrator/grand vizier to Ra, regent for Osiris), [[Geb (Earth-616)|Geb]] & [[Nut (Earth-616)|Nut]], [[Shu (Ennead) (Earth-616)|Shu]] & [[Tefnut (Earth-616)|Tefnut]], [[Atum (Earth-616)|Ammon Ra]] | CurrentMembers = [[Ennead]]/[[Helipolitans]] and affiliated gods: [[Anubis (Earth-616)|Anubis]], [[Bast (Earth-616)|Bast]], [[Bes (Earth-616)|Bes]], [[Horus (Deity) (Earth-616)|Horus]], [[Khonshu (Earth-616)|Khonshu]], [[Seth (Earth-616)|Seth]], [[Ptah (Earth-616)|Ptah]], [[Gaea (Earth-616)|Neith]], [[Oshtur (Earth-616)|Ma'at]], [[Hathor-Sekhmet (Earth-616)|Sekhmet]], [[Sobek (Earth-616)|Sobek]] | FormerMembers = [[Seth (Earth-616)|Seth]];
[[Ogdoad]]/[[Hermopolitans]] ([[Amaunet (Earth-616)|Amaunet]]) | Allies = [[Council of Godheads (Earth-616)|Council of Godheads]], [[Odin Borson (Earth-616)|Odin]], [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]] | Enemies = [[Seth (Earth-616)|Seth]] | Origin = | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = | First = | Last = | HistoryText = ===[[Ogdoad]]=== ... ===[[Ennead]]=== ... ===9th century=== Nubian settles from northern [[Sudan]] brought their worship of the gods of [[Egypt]] to [[Burunda]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Burunda]]'s entry}} ===Modern days=== While monotheism spread in Egypt and caused the end of the Helipolitans' worship, some Heliopolitans are still worshiped in [[Wakanda]] as the [[Orisha of Wakanda]],{{r|Black Panther Vol 6 13}} notably [[Bast (Earth-616)|Bast]] (the Panther God), as the patron deity of the nation,{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1}} but also [[Ptah (Earth-616)|Ptah]] and [[Thoth (Earth-616)|Thoth]].{{r|Black Panther Vol 6 13}} [[Hathor-Sekhmet (Earth-616)|Sekhmet]] (the Lion God) and [[Sobek (Earth-616)|Sobek]] (the Crocodile God) are as well patron of less influential [[East Africa]]n cults.{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = The status of some beings known as Egyptian deities among this group is unclear: * The man named [[Hypnotist (Dara) (Earth-616)|Dara]] was allegedly an Egyptian god.{{r|Young Men #27}} * While [[Gaea (Earth-616)|Gaea]] seemingly held some role among them as Neith,{{r|Avenging Spider-Man #7}} it is unknown if the [[Demiurge (Earth-616)|Demiurge]] did as well under his Egyptian name Nun. | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Egyptian Pantheon]]
